summary: This third edition provides a comprehensive overview of Human-Computer Interaction, exploring the significant changes since its first publication. summary: This document introduces UML Class Diagrams, explaining their fundamental role in object-oriented methodologies for describing a system's static structure. It covers basic symbols and notations, detailing how to represent classes and their associations within these diagrams.
